charges.charge_description: 21:846, 841(b)(1)(A)(ii)(II), 963, 960(a)(1) &; 960(b)(1)(B)(ii); 18:3551 et seq-CONSPIRED TO (a) IMPORT COCAINE, A SCH II NARCOTIC DRUG CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE; &; (b) TO POSSESS WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE COCAINE, A SCH II NARCOTIC DRUG CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft to be imprisoned for 72 months. Dft is remanded to the U.S. Marshal. Upon release from imprisonment, dft shall be on supervised release for 3 years. Dft is to pay the U.S. a special assessment of $100.00 which shall be due immediately. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:963, 960(a)(1) &; 952 Did knowingly &; intentionally conspire to unlawfully import into the US a Schedule II controlled substance. [1:96-m-1172]
